name: Mr Murphy
description:
Mr Murphy was made in less that a day as we could not work on it a lot due to some personal reasons, but we decided still to upload what we have.

it is a 2d platformer.

we used a bit of both themes (Dark miracle and Murphy's law)

player gets to see the map for a short period and everything gets dark, only a small circle around the player stay visible. (Dark miracle)

any where you walk, something can happen (Murphy's law)

The plan was to have some enemies.

Also have items drop (like a piano for example)

but due to lack of they it was not added.

Controls :

Left/Right : Controller /  a,d / arrows

Jump : Button 1 / Ctrl key

Harakiri (kill yourself if you get stuck) :  button 2 / Alt key

Tip : Rotating Platforms Are only triggered near edge

Assets Used from others 

2D Game Kit

Blue Knight
